About.paragraph: At OFMS, we empower businesses with the best available resources in the field of facility management. We work in collaborative thinking with business on their requirements to scale  and drive workplace solutions by closingÂ the loop on continuous hiring and training of new resources every time. We help businesses in identifying and focusing on  growth plans and leave the manpower requirements with us .
Why: Fulfilling employee recruitment issue with pool of talented professionals.
Why2: Find jobs that align with there skills and passion

Features.title: Training and Development
Features.text: Our customised training plan mostly revolves around programs that enable individual to learn precise skills or knowledge to sustain in the current demanding market.

Features.title: Recruitment
Features.text: Our expertise lies in our strong understanding of the clients requirements, innovative approaches mapping potential candidates.

Features.title: Staffing
Features.text: We draw on our research and profiling instruments to recruit and retain top-level resources with rapidly changing staffing and skill needs.

Features.title: Maintenance
Features.text: We design to simplify the maintenance management process by providing features such as asset management, preventive maintenance, work order management, inventory management etc.
